name: Confiscated!
description: This game was made for the Major game jam with the theme: Retro and with the limitation of 96 x 96 pixel Resolution. It was made using the GB studio game engine, and has a downloadable rom for the gameboy. Yes, that means you can play it on original hardware! This game follows a boy whose gameboy has been confiscated from him, it's up to you to guide him to his gameboy while avoiding being caught.
